messages.content: You are a helpful assistant, Parse the resume in JSON format

Prathyusha 
Full Stack Java Developer 
 
Email:pprathyusha1502@gmail.com ph: +1-814-824-9074 
 
Summary:Over 5 years of experience as a Java Full Stack Developer in IT industry.Extensively 
experienced in Software Analysis, Design, Development, Implementation and Testing of Object 
Oriented Applications and Web based Enterprise Applications using java/J2EE and Node JS. 
 
Technical Skills: 
Languages: Java, SQL, HTML, XML, JavaScript, PL/SQL 
Middleware Technologies: J2EE, EJB, JDBC 
Server-Side Technologies: JSP, Servlets 
Application/Web Servers: IBM Web Sphere 
Frameworks: Apache Struts Framework, Spring Framework, Hibernate 
IDE/Tools: Eclipse, Net Beans, CRXDE, CRXDE lite and Jenkins 
Web Services: SOAP, WSDL 
Content Management Systems: CQ 5.6, CQ/AEM6.2 and AEM6.5 
Build Tools: Ant, Maven 
 
Certifications: AWS Certified Developer Associate 
 
Professional Experience: 
 
Prime Therapeutics-Minneapolis, MN Sep 2020-till date 
Role: Software Developer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 Implemented design and development of web services which includes handling REST/SOAP 
request and response using Postman. 
 Used Adobe Experience Manager (AEM) as a content management system for organizing and 
managing assets. 
 Designed and developed, CQ5 building blocks including templates, components, dialogs, 
widgets, and workflows. 
 Developed static web pages, landing pages using content management system AEM 6.2. 
 Developed the service client layer to publish the Restful services using the Servlets. 
 Developed back-end logic with Core Java using technologies including Collection Framework, 
Multi-Threading. 
 Hands on experience on working Java 8 features like Lambda expressions, Default methods 
and Type annotations. 
 Developed and optimized services using Node.JS and ES6 as interfaces to Cassandra NoSQL 
database. 
 Redesigned and re-implemented services using NGINX, Node JS, Express JS, Mongo DB, and 
MySQL. 
 Created SOAP Web Services using WSDL, XML and SOAP for transferring data. 
 Designed and implemented templates, components for website pages through AEM 6.2. 
mailto:pprathyusha1502@gmail.com
 Designed and developed UI for portfolio review dashboard application using Angular Js, 
JavaScript and jQuery. 
 Developed templates using the JSP and Ractive.js for creating and rendering the templates. 
 Used AEM Developer tools for exporting and importing content to and from AEM repository. 
 Implemented server-side service components using Apache Felix framework and Apache 
Sling. 
 Implemented Kafka producer and consumer applications on Kafka cluster setup with help of 
zookeeper. 
 Created TypeScript reusable components and services to consume REST API'S using 
components-based architecture provided by Angular. 
 Developed CI/CD system with Jenkins on Kubernetes environment, utilized Kubernetes and 
Docker for the runtime environment for the CI/CD system to build, Test and Deploy. 
 Involved in implementation of persistence layer using Hibernate and prepared value objects. 
 Used jQuery Promises, Ajax for service calls on pages to interact with the server for 
information. 
 Used Spring Kafka API calls to process the messages smoothly on Kafka cluster setup. 
 Involved in developing the applications using Spring Framework for Dependency Injection. 
 Worked upon the Dialog creation and providing authorability so that user can use the template 
to create the targeted content and publish them. 
 Experience with cloud technologies like Google Cloud Platform (GCP). 
 Involved in fixing DEV, UAT, and production defects. 
 Used Anthill, Jenkins as a build management server to control build process. 
 Participated in code releases and responsible for deployment code to production. 
 
 
Environment: Java 8, AEM 6.2, CRX, Rest, SOAP, JavaScript, jQuery, Json, Eclipse, Ractive.js, 
Jsp, Ajax, Bootstrap, Apache Sling, Anthill, Node.JS, Jenkins, Spring, Web services, Gradle, Git, 
Kubernetes, docker, GCP, SVN. 
 
 
Northern Trust Bank-Tempe, AZ Feb 2020-August 2020 
Role: Software Developer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 New library development with microservices architecture using Rest APIs, spring boot and 
PCF. 
 Understanding the business requirement and functional specification of the client module. 
 Rest services templates are generated using swagger specifications. 
 Bi-weekly sprints using agile development methodologies. 
 Migrating existing applications into microservices architecture using Rest APIs, Spring Cloud 
config Netflix (eureka). 
 Used Web services - REST and SOAP for getting information from third party. 
 Wrote Hibernate configuration file, hibernate mapping files, and define persistence classes to 
persist the data into Oracle database. 
 Generated SQL and PL/SQL scripts to install create and drop database objects like tables, 
views, etc. 
 Modularized front-end CSS and JS code with Sass. Built a real time mouse/click user analytics 
web service with Node.js 
 Developed the application using spring framework that leverages model view layer 
architecture, also configured Dependency Injection. 
 Developed SQL, PL/SQL, stored procedures database application scripts. 
 Have knowledge on partition of Kafka messages and setting up the replication factors in Kafka 
cluster. 
 Experience in major web application servers: Apache Tomcat, JBoss, Express Node.JS 
and Apache HTTP Server. 
 Experience with Front-end JavaScript frameworks like Angular JS, Node JS. And with the 
creation of RESTful Web service. 
 Deployment of web, enterprise java components, messaging components and multi-threading. 
 Using Git repository and GitHub bit bucket for version controlling and code review. 
 Working with Jira tool to track product backlogs, planning and release, etc. 
 Involved in regression testing in different environments like system, UAT. 
 
Environment: Java 8, Microservices, Servlets, JSP, REST, Apache Kafka, Soap UI, PCF, 
Hibernate, Scrum Agile, JDBC, SQL, Postman, Spring Boot, SOAP, Jenkins, GIT, JSP, Web 
Services, IntelliJ, JIRA. 
 
 
Accruent-Minneapolis, MN April 2018-Jan 2020 
Role: Software Developer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
 Involved in the analysis and design phase of the Software Development Life Cycle (SDLC). 
 Conducted a detailed analysis of user requirements and formulated technical requirements. 
 Used SCRUM for agile development and participate in requirement gathering, design, 
implementation, and reviewing phases. 
 Worked on Core Java concepts such as multi-threading, collections, garbage collection, data 
structures, and algorithms during the development phase. 
 Extensive experience in the development and implementation of ORM framework Hibernate/ 
Hibernate with Spring Data Access. 
 Designed application components using java collections and providing concurrent database 
access using multi-threading. 
 Used JDBC prepared statements to call from service to database access. 
 Developed the user interface using JSP, jQuery, and JavaScript and enhanced response using 
Bootstrap services like JDBC. 
 Worked extensively with java including Threads and collections. 
 Deep understanding of HTTP as a protocol including content negotiation, idempotency, and 
the various response codes and their semantic meanings. 
 Created Tables, Indexes and Triggers Using Oracle. 
 Design and implement components for the Adobe CQ platform. 
 Implemented custom components using cq tags, jQuery, JavaScript and JSP. 
 Worked on implementing server-side service components using Apache Felix framework and 
Apache Sling. 
 Worked on UI interface using HTML5, CSS3, AJAX, JavaScript, jQuery and React Js. 
 Has experience handling HTTP/JSON or SOAP APIs at scale. 
 Used React JS for templating for faster compilation and developing reusable components. 
 Involved in fixing DEV, UAT, and production defects. 
 
Environment: Java 8, Hibernate, Microservices, Scrum Agile, JDBC, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, 
AJAX, Agile, jQuery, SQL, SOAP, AEM, dispatcher, Apache Flexis, React Js, Jenkins, GIT, JSP, 
Web Services, Eclipse ID, JIRA. 
 
TCF National Bank- Plymouth, MN July 2017  March 2018 
Role: J2EE Developer 
 
Responsibilities: 
 
 Implemented Spring MVC framework and integrated user Interface layer with persistence 
layer through spring and hibernate. 
 Developed server-side services using Spring 4.0, web services (Soap and WSDL). 
 Developing APIs to expose data from Cassandra NoSQL database. 
 Implemented data layer with Spring Data, JPA, and native SQL query to retrieve and update 
data from the database. 
 Used Soap UI and Postman tools to test the rest web service operations. 
 Developed server-side utilities using Java Beans, XML, and Apache Camel. 
 Develop user interfaces using AngularJS, jQuery, bootstrap, HTML5, and CSS. 
 Used Angular 2 to develop single-page applications. 
 Used Gradle build tool to automate the process of generating Docker files, building Docker 
Images, and pushing them to Docker Private Registry. 
 Used Log4j for logging messages and debugging application. 
 Used Spring Core Annotations for Dependency Injection and used Apache Camel to integrate 
the spring framework. 
 Added dynamic functionality to the application by implementing jQuery, Node Js. 
 Used Java8 features in developing the code like Lambda expressions, creating resource classes, 
fetching documents from database. 
 Involved in design and developing the Microservices based on the requirements functionalities. 
 Involving Spring MVC, Spring Security, Spring JPA, Spring AOP. 
 Setup source code management in GitHub and developed and documented best practices for 
managing and releasing code. 
 
Environment: Java8, Hibernate, Apache Camel, Jboss, JDBC, JUnit, Agile, Gradle, TOMCAT, 
Spring Security, Microservices, Kafka, Spring Boot, Cassandra, Jenkins, Angular 2, NoSQL, Node 
JS, GIT.

You are a helpful assistant, Parse the resume in JSON format

Rajeev Kumar
rajeevkumarit31@gmail.com / 267-250-6605
Senior .Net Developer

Actively looking for professional assignments with an organization as Microsoft ASP.NET MVC Developer

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY:

12+ years of hands-on experience in developing various applications using Microsoft .NET Technologies like ASP.NET, C#, MVC, WCF, Web Services, Web API, ADO. Net, Entity Framework, Sql server, .NET Framework 6.1.
Developed applications in wide range of technologies like JavaScript, JQuery, Angular.js, AJAX, XML/XSLT, and JSON.
Sound Knowledge in Object Oriented Programming concepts and good implementation Skills.
Expertise in rich UI design using HTML5, CSS, Telerik, Kendo UI, Razor View, JQuery, AngularJS and JavaScript.
Implemented LINQ for querying, sorting, filtering the complex objects.
Extensive experience in popular data providers like SQL Server 2014/18
Expertise in creating complex SQL queries, Stored Procedures, Constraints, Indexes, Views, Cursors, Triggers, and User Defined Functions.
Experience publishing reports, working with SSIS, SSRS
Experience in Share Point, MOSS, WSS Share Point Designer, Info Path.
Efficient in working with AGILE Methodology.
Experience in writing test cases, automating test cases, performing unit tests using NUnit.
Experience in using Team Foundation Server (TFS), Bit Bucket and Visio Source Safe (VSS). 
Involved the deployment process – CI/CD with Team City and UDeploy
Developed, deployed and debugged applications using Microsoft Visual Studio.
Active involvement in all the phases of software development life cycle (SDLC) including Analysis, Design, Development, Testing, Implementation, and Documentation.
Excellent team player with problem-solving and trouble-shooting capabilities.
Involved in interaction with users and creating specifications.
Ability to adjust in new environments with a drive for results through self-motivation.
Ability to work in-groups as well as independently with minimal supervision.
Excellent professional ethics with problem solving, analytical and interpersonal skills.
Proficiency at grasping new technical concepts quickly and utilizing the same in a productive manner.

TECHNICAL SKILLS: 




FUNCTIONAL:

Project Execution
Interacting with clients for requirement gathering, risk assessment, finalization of technical specifications.
Developing plans & schedules, allocating resource as per budgets, manpower deployment and team meetings for individual projects.
Interacting with team members to ensure smooth progress of project work.

System Analysis
Coordinating System/ Requirement Analysis for understanding client {internal/external} business processes and mapping them to required framework standards.
Suggesting appropriate as well as technology-based solutions for enhancing functional efficiency of the organization and achieving business excellence. 
Interacting and building relationships with clients for addressing challenging issues. 

Programme Development/ Technical Architecture
Contributing to the design, development, testing, troubleshooting and debugging of the software.
Providing post-implementation, application maintenance and enhancement support to the client with regard to the product/ software application.

PROFESSIONAL EXPERIENCE:

Company	: Virtusa						Feb 2016- Till date

Project Title  	: Commercial Cards
Duration	: Since Aug 2018 to Till Date
Role		: Development
Client	  	: Citi Group
Project Description :-
Rebate project has the set of web applications to setup/maintain the clients and their metadata. That is used to calculate the refund for clients. Web application also have the functionalities including client setup, manual adjustment with maker checker, quality control and reporting. 
Console application is developed to calculate the refund and generate several reports. Jobs are setup to generate report with different input at different point of time. These reports can be generated on ad-hoc request after any adjustment.

Responsibilities:
Worked on the technical analysis and technical design of the project.
Development with ASP.NET, C#, MVC, Web API, Entity Framework and LINQ.
Worked with HTML, CSS, Razor, JavaScript and JQuery. 
Write database objects- procedures, functions, views, cursor and designing table schema in SQL Server 2018.
Used Bit Bucket and TFS for Source Control for the project development and manage.
Performed the unit testing and deployment activities.
Discuss and finalized business requirements.
Attend the scrum call as project run under the AGILE methodology.
Worked with JIRA for the release management. 
Involved the deployment process – CI/CD with Team City and UDeploy


Environment: ASP.NET, C#, MVC, Web API, WCF, Entity Framework, LINQ, Jquery, HTML, Razor, SQL Server 2014, JIRA, TFS and CI/CD with Bitbucket, Team City and UDeploy.

Project Title  	: Citi Connect - Payment Rules
Duration	: Since Aug 2017 to Till Date
Role		: Development
Client	  	: Citi Group
Project Description :-
Application is repository of the Payment Rules that define how the Payment ISO messages should be structured for information exchange. Through the application, create and maintain the rules for different format, country and payment method those will be followed by payment messages with maker checker approach. Application has wide range of functionalities including create the payment message and validate this against the payment rules and submit the payment message to down stream for processing. Application has dashboard showing the validated, succeeded, failed and downstream processed statistics. Wide rage of reports are available for different data points.

Responsibilities:
Discuss and finalized business requirements.
Worked on the technical analysis and technical design of the project.
Development with ASP.NET, C#, MVC, WCF, Web API, Entity Framework and LINQ.
Worked with HTML, Razor, JavaScript and JQuery. 
Write database objects- procedures, functions, views, cursor and designing table schema in SQL Server 2014.
Used TFS for Source Control for the project development and manage.
Attend the scrum call as project run under the AGILE methodology.
Worked with JIRA for the release management. 
Performed the unit testing and deployment activities.

Environment: ASP.NET, C#, MVC, Web API, WCF, Entity Framework, LINQ, Jquery, HTML, Razor, SQL Server 2014, JIRA and TFS.

Project Title  	: AML
Duration	: Since Feb 2016 to Aug 2017
Role		: Development
Client	  	: Citi Group
Project Description :-
AML project is for Citi Group risk department.  This application measures the various security aspects for all the products before launch over the globe. User input the data for each product into the system and system calculate the associated risk and accordingly route the product to various approval levels. Approver check all the criteria at his/her level and approve for next level. System provide the user dashboard for the quick overview with  the different types of charts. System provide the multiple types by reports region, risk and status. User can export the reports/data in excel, PDF or print. Application provide the quick and advance search based on the multiple criteria. System collect, analyzes and exchanges actionable intelligence that increases Citi's threat awareness and protection levels.

Responsibilities:
Involved in gathering business requirements, evaluating the existing data and related procedures of the project.
Worked extensively with the end-users of various departments to gather Business Data for the requirements and gave demos.
Involved in requirement analysis and technical design of the project.
Involved in the all phases of development including UI, business logic and backbend database access and operations.
Development with ASP.NET, C#, MVC, WCF, Web API, Entity Framework and LINQ.
Worked on the rich user interface with HTML, Kendo UI, Razor, JavaScript, Angular.js, JQuery and CSS. 
Write database queries and objects like procedures, functions, views, cursor and designing table schema in SQL Server 2012.
Created the SSIS package/reports and setup the database jobs to deliver these reports per schedule.
Implement the charts for the visual presentation and provide different types of reports and advanced search functionality.
Used TFS as the Source Control for the project development and manage.
Follow the AGILE methodology for the project development and management.
Used the JIRA for the release management. 
Write the unit test cases and performed along with the integrated testing.
Involved in the post development, build and deployment activities on Dev, UAT and production environments.
Prepared training material presentations and related documentation to use for the team.

Environment: ASP.NET, C#, MVC, Web Services, WCF, Entity Framework, LINQ, JSON, Jquery, Java Script, Angular, HTML, Razor, SQL Server 2012, SSIS, JIRA and TFS.


Company	: NTT DATA INC						March 2011 – Feb 2016

Project title	: IMS Platform- Manager Dashboard
Duration	: Since JAN 2013 to Feb 2016
Role		: Design/Development
Client	  	: SEI INVESTMENTS
Project Description :-
IMS Platform is a common platform for many application for the the SEI and Manager Dashboard is one of them. Manager Dashboard have the various kinds of reports for the multiple clients. Each client have access to their reports to view and he can customize the reports with N number of parameters then save as new report or overwrite existing one. Different kinds of search criteria available to filter/group the report data. Various kinds of chart shows the report facts along with the tabular data. User can export the reports to PDF or CSV and can schedule a report to send in mail or FTP location daily/weekly/ specific dates. User can set their dashboard by choosing the reports to display in it. Dashboard shows the updated fact/ charts as per the user preference.   

Responsibilities:
Involved in analyzing, designing, development, Testing, implementation and enhancement of customized applications.
Involved in modification of the existing applications to meet User’s changing needs and train users in the application as necessary.
Used ASP.NET, C#, MVC and WCF and Web API for developing the application.
For the interactive UI part used the Kendo UI, Razor View, JavaScript, HTML 5, JQuery and CSS. 
Used Entity Framework, ADO.Net objects for accessing the data from the database. 
Performed the set of operations on the dataset objects with LINQ (Language Integrated Query).
Used SSRS to generate reports on demand.
Involved in analyzing requirements and technical design of the project.
Implemented and used WCF Services to interact with internal systems.
Write T-SQL procedures, functions, designing Databases in SQL SERVER 2012.
Used client-side JavaScript and AJAX controls to improve the responsive nature of the application
Involved in implementing design specification, fixing bugs and code refactoring.
Improved performance by using Caching the data for WCF service that was taking more time to retrieve. Exception handling was done thoroughly.
Used SVN as the Source Control in the entire development of the project.
Deliver the work items as per the Agile project plan with high quality.

Environment: .NET Framework 4.5, ASP.NET, C#, MVC4, WCF, Web API, Razor View, Entity Framework, LINQ, SSRS, SQL Server 2012 R2, Ajax,  CSS, JavaScript, XML, JSON, Kendo, HTML 5, Visual Studio 2012, 2013,  SVN, JIRA.


Project title  	: SEI-Service Requestor
Duration	: Since March 2011- Dec 2012
Client	  	: SEI
Role 		: Share Point Developer
Project Description:-
SEI Service Request (SSR) is an application that provides secure web based communication between SEI and its clients. Clients initiate a request in SSR by filling out a web-based form and submitting it.  Different forms are programmed to collect data for particular requests. The submitted form creates a ticket for the request and each request is assigned a unique ticket number by the system. The ticket is processed through predefined workflow patterns that ultimately result in a completed request.  Client and SEI users can monitor the status of tickets through a number of views and dashboards in the system. Provide a platform for the efficient content management.  Application has the implementation OOTB Web Parts, Custom Web Parts, Lists, Document Libraries, Features, Event Receivers, Workflows, Info path forms, Custom Master Page and branding. Good use of content management system. 
	
Responsibilities:-
Involved in gathering business data, analyzing the requirements, evaluating the existing data and related procedures of the project.
Worked extensively with the end-users of various departments to gather Business Data for the requirements and gave demos to the department heads.
Developed portal and content management application using a custom site definition, custom feature development and custom web parts.
Created custom Share Point sites, sub sites, Document Libraries, Lists and List views to collaborate the Affiliates using visual studio.
Created custom Share Point Web Parts using Visual Studio, Asp.net, C# with Microsoft. Share Point and Microsoft.SharePoint.Webpartpages object model.
Migrated Share Point Sites, Lists and Libraries, web parts, permissions, documents between servers using Share Point Site Migration Manager.
Developed custom forms using Info Path and published into Share Point forms library.
Developed and implemented custom workflow forms using Info Path and custom workflows using Share Point Object model and MS Office
Performed administration tasks i.e providing access levels, permissions, creating users and groups in active directory etc. in Share Point Portal server.
Customized Publishing pages with workflows in Share Point Designer.
Integrated SQL and Access data tables with the share point lists and created the custom web parts to display the SQL data in the share point portal pages.
Developed the CAML queries and performed unit testing.
Maintained design requirements documentation with accurate information sharing.
Prepared training material presentations and related documentation to use for the team
Plans, schedules and performed proactive maintenance, including software upgrades and patch installation.

Environment: Share Point 2010, MOSS 2007, Visual Studio with C#, ASP.NET, MS-Info Path,  Share Point Designer, Active Directory,  ADO.NET, IIS, SQL Server, HTML, XML.

Sapa Extrusions | Process Engineer | Los Angeles, CA Jan 2012 - Oct 2015

Vantage Master Machine | Process Engineer | San Diego, CA Jun 2010 - Jan 2011
 Developed manufacturing processes for flight critical parts for Boeing 767 and 787 through analyzing dimensional

Marine Science Institute | Mechanical Engineer (MATLAB Programmer) | Santa Barbara, CA Jun 2006 - Sept 2008
